io.spine.tools.mc.js.code

Class CodeWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.tools.mc.js.code.CodeWriter

  • public final class CodeWriter
extends java.lang.Object
    The aggregator of the JavaScript output.

    This class serves as the JS code storage as well as provides the convenience methods for adding the code.

    The writable representation of the output may be obtained through the string representation.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CodeWriter()
      Creates a new instance the standard indentation.
      CodeWriter(io.spine.tools.code.Indent indent)
      Creates an instance of the JsOutput with the custom indentation.

    • Method Detail

      • lineSeparator

        public static java.lang.String lineSeparator()
        Obtains the string for separating code lines.

      • append

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public CodeWriter append(CodeWriter writer)
        Appends code from the passed writer to this one.

        If the appended lines have different indent level, the level of appended lines is adjusted to match the level of the current lines.

        The indent level is adjusted by the difference of the levels.

        Writing to the passed writer after this method exists will not have effect on this writer.

        Parameters:
        writer - the code to append to this instance

      • append

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public CodeWriter append(Snippet snippet)
        Appends the lines of the snippet.

      • append

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public CodeWriter append(java.lang.String code)
        Appends the line of code on the current indent level.
        Parameters:
        code - the code to add

      • append

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public CodeWriter append(io.spine.tools.code.Line line)
        Appends the code line.

        If the passed line is already indented, it is appended as is. Otherise, the indentation of this code block is applied.

        Parameters:
        line - the line to append

      • enterMethod

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public CodeWriter enterMethod(java.lang.String methodName,
                                                    java.lang.String... methodArgs)
        Declares a method and prepares the writer for adding its body by increasing the level of indentation.
        Parameters:
        methodName - the full method name including type name
        methodArgs - the args to pass to the method

      • enterBlock

        @CanIgnoreReturnValue
public CodeWriter enterBlock(java.lang.String blockHeader)
        Enters block with the custom header.

        For example, the custom header may be for (let value in list).

        Parameters:
        blockHeader - the block header
